author: ehillenius
msg: removed double file header from code template

author: ivaynberg
msg: Ajax now uses setOuterHtml instead of setInnerHtml. This allows components tags to be updated as well and reduces the need for an additional container in some cases.

author: ehillenius
msg: extend from AbstractResourceStreamLocator instead of directly implementing the interface as this would be a better real world use (takes the locale and style etc into account).

author: ehillenius
msg: exposed implementation methods so that the locators can be decorated more easily
